K12D0466_H0431:292a-26: 'khor lo grar ni lha mo bzhi //
K12D0466_H0431:292a-27: dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri //
K12D0466_H0431:292a-28: dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni /
K12D0466_H0431:292a-35: lha mo sgrol ma'o; ;rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung
K12D0466_H0431:292a-36: nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni
K12D0466_H0431:292a-38: lhor rdo rje rin chen ma /
K12D0466_H0431:292a-40: byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-0: gra @292b rnams su skul byed ma dang //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-3: rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-4: de nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te rdo rje
K12D0466_H0431:292b-5: shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la
K12D0466_H0431:292b-6: shar phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang
K12D0466_H0431:292b-10: lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang /

K12D0466_H0431:292b-13: spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-14: nub phyogs su mthu chen thob dang /
K12D0466_H0431:292b-15: ngan song thams cad spong ba dang /
K12D0466_H0431:292b-16: mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /
K12D0466_H0431:292b-17: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-21: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-29: bgegs kyi gshed mthar byed do //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-37: sgo'i nang logs su yang rdo rje bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:292b-45: sna lngas bri bar bya ste /
K12D0466_H0431:293a-0: de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor @293a *//
K12D0466_H0431:293a-2: sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-4: padma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-5: snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni; rdo rje'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-12: de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-13: de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te
K12D0466_H0431:293a-14: spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog
K12D0466_H0431:293a-15: gi phreng ba mgo la bcings nas /
K12D0466_H0431:293a-16: mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la /
K12D0466_H0431:293a-17: ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa //

K12D0466_H0431:293a-19: spos chu yis ni bkang pa dang //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-20: bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-21: rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-22: bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-23: lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-24: sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-25: las kun byas pas bzlas brjod do //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-26: sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-27: yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-28: de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang /
K12D0466_H0431:293a-33: zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-34: de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grar gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-35: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni /
K12D0466_H0431:293a-36: dbus su spyan drang par bya'o //
K12D0466_H0431:293a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0466_H0431:293b-0: lha rnams sbyan @293b drangs nas gsal bar bya ste
K12D0466_H0431:293b-6: dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang /

K12D0466_H0431:293b-15: dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang /

K12D0466_H0431:293b-22: de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go //

K12D0466_H0431:293b-24: phyag rgyas gnas lngar srung zhing gnas lngar cho ga
K12D0466_H0431:293b-25: bya'o // h'um aom dzi na dzi na ka /
K12D0466_H0431:293b-30: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste /
K12D0466_H0431:293b-31: rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i //
K12D0466_H0431:293b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12D0466_H0431:293b-34: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12D0466_H0431:293b-35: rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste /
K12D0466_H0431:293b-37: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g-yogs 'gril lo //
K12D0466_H0431:293b-38: de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-1: gyis; ;sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-2: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-3: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-4: dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-5: rdo rje padma rol pa'i mchog /

K12D0466_H0431:294a-10: dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-11: gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-12: steng du bla re bre bar bya //

K12D0466_H0431:294a-14: lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-15: gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-16: bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-17: slob ma sdig dang bral ba la //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-18: slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-19: dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-20: de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-21: lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-22: bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-23: rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-24: skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du //

K12D0466_H0431:294a-26: rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni //

K12D0466_H0431:294a-28: dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-29: de lta bur ni bsams nas kyang //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-30: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya //
K12D0466_H0431:294a-31: thur ma me long 'khor lo dang //

K12D0466_H0431:294a-33: gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis //
K12D0466_H0431:294b-0: mi shes rab rib la @294b sogs pa //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-2: thur ma la sogs med na yang //
K12D0466_H0431:294b-3: phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-6: srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-10: sdang la byams shing chags bral ba //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-13: khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-22: bla ma mgu ba dngos grub kyi //

K12D0466_H0431:294b-26: de nas cho ga mthong bas las byas nas /

K12D0466_H0431:294b-35: ba yi lci bas byug par bya //
K12D0466_H0431:294b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
K12D0466_H0431:295a-1: dpon nyid kyis bsdu bar bya //
K12D0466_H0431:295a-2: slob mas cung zad mi spyad do //

K12D0466_H0431:295a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo

K12D0466_H0431:339b-25: me yi lha ni zhal yin pas //
K12D0466_H0431:339b-26: sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i //
K12D0466_H0431:339b-27: sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshang //

K12D0466_H0431:339b-30: gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa //
K12D0466_H0431:339b-31: thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skong //
K12D0466_H0431:339b-32: de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis //

K12D0466_H0431:340a-2: gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-3: me yis las rnams rab bsgrub pa //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-4: thab khung zlum bo gru bzhi pa //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-5: zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa; ;dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer la //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-6: rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-7: sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-8: thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni /
K12D0466_H0431:340a-9: padmo steng gnas gtsug tor dang //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-10: rdo rje rin chen padma gzhag /
K12D0466_H0431:340a-11: ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-12: lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-13: dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-14: blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg /
K12D0466_H0431:340a-15: sbyin sreg la dgos g-yas su gzhag /
K12D0466_H0431:340a-16: g-yon du chu yi snod dag go /

K12D0466_H0431:340a-19: ku sha'i rtse mos non pa yis //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-20: thabs khung khor yug bskor bar bya //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-21: me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang //

K12D0466_H0431:340a-23: gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-24: me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-25: tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che //
K12D0466_H0431:340a-26: lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /

K12D0466_H0431:340a-28: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //

K12D0466_H0431:340b-0: gsus po che la @340b mig gsum pa //

K12D0466_H0431:340b-17: rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni /

K12D0466_H0431:340b-19: legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te //

K12D0466_H0431:340b-22: padma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag /

K12D0466_H0431:340b-27: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni //

K12D0466_H0431:340b-29: dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring pa dang //
K12D0466_H0431:340b-30: bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar //
K12D0466_H0431:340b-31: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba mo //

K12D0466_H0431:340b-33: dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang //

K12D0466_H0431:341a-2: h'um zhes pa dang phat dang bcas //

K12D0466_H0431:341a-10: sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing //

K12D0466_H0431:341a-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan //

K12D0466_H0431:341a-33: dper na chus gang chu klung gi //

K12D0466_H0431:341b-1: rtsva dang shing la sogs bsdus te //

K12D0466_H0431:341b-29: tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing //
K12D0466_H0431:341b-30: mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di //

K12D0466_H0431:342a-5: sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi /
